text: Jim Crossan is a Northern Irish former football player and manager. Crossan played with Derry City when they played in the Irish League, and represented them in both the European Cup Winners' Cup and European Cup. He was the club's first manager when they began competing in the League of Ireland, although his spell at the club, which began in 1985, did not last a full season. He was a Northern Ireland amateur international. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Association football defenders Category:Association footballers from Northern Ireland Category:Derry City F.C. players Category:NIFL Premiership players Category:Football managers from Northern Ireland Category:Derry City F.C. managers Category:League of Ireland managers Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Jim Crossan
